Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
16.09.2014 SH SCR19153 Added PI.HUSR_ID and PO.CLNA_ID
08.08.2014 AS SCR#18656 changed CLBA selection according to new specs
26.06.2014 GB SCR18991 Removed part Inform account manager
-- First CLBA selection with PI.CLBA414_ID
... only one CLBA row will be selected
-- Amount must be split (cannot be transferred as whole amount to one bank account)
... one or more CLBA row(s) will be selected, depends how it's defined in CLBA for the
current handled client

ExpSyntax.val: 'CLBA414_ADMNO='&Trim(Str({0,4},'4')) & ' and CLBA414_CLNTNO=' & Trim(Str({0,5},'5')) & ' and (CLBA414_DEFAULTPERCENTAGE>0 and CLBA414_DEFAULTPERCENTAGE<100)' & ' and CLBA414_ID<>'&Trim(Str({1,1},'9')) & ' and CLBA_WAITFORAPPROVAL='&''''&'N'&''''

Text.val: -- Book whole amount to initial selected client bankaccount (CLBA414_ID=PI.CLBA414_ID) or
first partial amount if amount has to be split
... amount cannot be transferred to one bankaccount, remaining amount will be booked
within next cycle of current task
-- Book remaining amount to other bankaccounts (amount is split)
Info: In OCA004BA there's a test to make sure that the total of default percentages is always 100%,
so there's no need to implement a logic to end the split when the whole amount is booked
-- Set CLNA_ID
... update with CLNA_ID of first stored CLNA row (reason why testing on PO.CLNA_ID=0)
-- Store MQ132 (Foreign currency advances, must be approved via OMQ132)
-- Variables used to book possible remaining amount
